EmailTemplate.description: Email used to warn VR Finance that a certification had been submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Submit Certification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: certificationBatchName Ready for Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Finance,
There is a Sales Certification Batch CertificationBatchName for period certificationPeriodFrom to certificationPeriodTo in Salesforce ready for you to review.
Please click here to review the Sales Certification record website_here
Many thanks
Salesforce Team
